resources.string: Please wait 10 seconds to try again
Invalid data, you have spent your 3 attempts.

I\'m the 7up drink mascot, they know me as FIDO DIDO. It is a pleasure that you have entered my application, I hope you feel comfortable there. You can visit the MENU that is at the top right of the screen.
DID YOU REALLY BELIEVE WE HAD DRINKS? YOU GONE RE-BAITED MASTER
Na lie, we don\'t have stock xd

At 7UP, we are proud to be one of the most iconic and recognized brands in the soft drink industry. From our humble beginnings to becoming a global leader, we have left a refreshing mark on the lives of millions of people around the world.

Our story began in 1929, when Charles Leiper Grigg introduced the world to a unique and revolutionary soft drink: 7UP. Since then, we have stood out for offering a refreshing, bubbly and unique flavor that has delighted generations for more than 90 years.
Our team is made up of passionate and creative individuals who share a common goal: to provide our consumers with the best possible refreshing drink experience.

Thank you for choosing 7UP. We are excited to continue refreshing the world and sharing unforgettable moments with you. Join us on this delicious adventure as we continue to evolve and deliver the flavor you love. Refresh your day with 7UP!
If you have any questions, CONTACT US!
